subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Paris Attacks (November 2015)
Security and Warning Systems
lead_paragraph: Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro expressed confidence in security for next year’s Olympics in his city, but he was also cautious in the wake of the attacks in Paris on Nov. 13.
snippet: Mayor Eduardo Paes of Rio de Janeiro expressed confidence in security for next year’s Olympics in his city, but he was also cautious in the wake of the attacks in Paris on Nov. 13.
